message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you a product that I believe holds significant value, potentially exceeding $1000000.  While I can't disclose the exact nature of the product right now, I'm confident it will be of great interest to you. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1250000. This is a price that reflects the potential value I see in this product.  Consider this a chance to acquire something truly special. What do you say?
